content: i used red heart comfort yarn bunny is 15 inches tall from ear to toe bunny has a dress with matching shoes and more to come pattern comes with a full video tutorial right here 1 **accessory patterns** overalls here 2 carrot dress here 3 spring dress here 4 basket of carrots here 5 **************** pattern available in danish here 6 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=7-74mro1tso&list=plbuvhsa9qzabfoajvpv38su2kbh1lcx3j&index=1 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/overalls-for-bunny 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/carrot-dress 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-spring-time-dress 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/basket-of-carrots 6 http //www amigurumitogo com/2015/06/danish-amigurumi-patterns-translation html
